title: Cabulosa released at YWFT
content:
I am proud to announce the release of Cabulosa, a brasilian urban calligraphy inspired typeface.

Available at [YWFT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025705/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0303).

For further information on Cabulosa, download the pdf [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025705/http:/www.chibachiba.com/Cabulosa.pdf)

And for those of you who aren't familiar with the style, here's a preview of a nice documentary that is about to be released on the theme. Directed by João Wainer:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8-lDyq6pw0E](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025705/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=8-lDyq6pw0E "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8-lDyq6pw0E")

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TtlRZdLGi3I](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025705/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=TtlRZdLGi3I "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TtlRZdLGi3I")
author: Chiba Chiba

comments.content:
The PDF link is broken.

You’re doing a great job of reminding people that there’s still plenty of room for experimentation with plain old vector outlines!

Thank you very much for the kind words James!  
Too bad I won't be seen you in a ATL.  
PDF link is fixed now.

Great!  
I used to gaze at this kind of lettering on my friend's graffiti book.

Thanks Mk2!  
Foundation Cartier just made available a longer piece of the documentary on that style:

[http://www.juxtapoz.com/7628-Pixo-short-version-documentary](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014025705/http:/www.juxtapoz.com/7628-Pixo-short-version-documentary "http://www.juxtapoz.com/7628-Pixo-short-version-documentary")
